Reviews.Title: Review of the Blackjack smart phone
Reviews.Author: Bulldog
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased with this cell phone. The sound quality is good and it is easy to use. The only criticism is the ease of making inadvertant phone calls when the key board is not locked.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever
Reviews.Author: Wafflz
Reviews.Content: I have had my original blackjack for a year and a half now. It is the best phone i have ever owned and it never gives me problems. It is extremely durable as i have a tendency of throwing my phone when angry and it still works fine.(just a few scratches). Keyboard is great and the internet browser is superb. Many apps are available if you look online and includes Microsoft Word which is convenient. Only complaint would be low camera resolution in the dark due to no flash.

Reviews.Title: Happy so far
Reviews.Author: A. Hunter "A. Danger"
Reviews.Content: I needed a new phone that I could organize myself with. This is perfect. It hasn't let me down. The Qwerty keyboard is something to get used to but when you do its great. There are plenty of good security measures to use on this phone and I don't feel the least bit limited. Great phone, great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: I was so happy with my samsung phone it lasted me a long time, it had many great features. I was so sad when it got wet and I couldn't use it anymore.

Reviews.Title: Not a very good phone.
Reviews.Author: A. Macarty
Reviews.Content: I have only had this phone for about a month, and I have had nothing but problems with it. It always says "No Sim" so I cannot make calls or send texts. This phone also seems to be pretty slow compaired to past cell phones I have had such as the blackberry pearl. I am not happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Smartphone.
Reviews.Author: Carla J. Moody
Reviews.Content: I did not know what to do with this phone.  I knew I needed a phone.  the local stores did not know what to do with this phone other than put me in a contract with one of their phones.  years after having the phone I was able to trade it in a get a phone with service and a monthly fee.
